mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `review` (review_title, review_content,review_date, review_rating, review_liked, review_img, member_userid, product_id) VALUES (#{review_title}, #{review_content},now() ,#{review_rating}, "0", #{review_img}, #{member_userid}, #{product_id});
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_title = #{review_title}, review_content = #{review_content}, review_rating = #{review_rating}, review_liked = #{review_liked}, review_img = #{review_img}, member_userid = #{member_userid} WHERE review_id = #{review_id}
UPDATE review SET review_liked = review_liked+1 WHERE review_id = #{review_id};
